E-commerce drives retail brand value growth, while US brands continue to dominate the sector | Press Release | Brand Finance
s: April 8, 2025 - LONDON, 8 April 2025 - Retail brands are seeing robust growth, particularly in e-commerce, according to a new report from Brand Finance, the world's leading brand valuation consultancy. The total brand value of the world’s top 100 most valuable retail brands has risen 9% to USD1.3 trillion in 2025. 36 US brands contribute 68% of the total ranking value, amounting to USD856.1 billion.
